title: Are any of the Primrose children (Hugh and Ann - my grandmother, Mable Walker, raised them). Are they still in Wilmington, if not where are they. I would love to be in contact with them.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. I couldn't find Ann, but here's a listing for Hugh: http://www.whitepages.com/name/Hugh-W-Jr-Primrose/Wilmington-NC/2iq3scz
